Footer.FooterText: This website has been developed with the VueJS technology and the Semantic UI CSS library. The whole contents is property of its author. For any specific wish, feel free to contact me on the appropriate page.

Welcome.Title: Welcome on my Website!
Welcome.Content1: Welcome on my brand new Website ! It has been updated on {contentUpdate} (software : {softUpdate}). Developed with the {vue-link} framework, it is more lisible and simple. The design has been created with the {semantic-link} CSS library.
Welcome.Content2: The website is not yet totally bilingual, but I am still working hard on it! It tooks so much time to translate all its contents. A small {actualite} will be published when it will be completely translated to english ðŸ˜‰. For the moment, only some components are available, and also my {cv}.

Website.Title: APGMB's website
Website.Text: WordPress website realized to meet the digital development of the Burgundy Mustard seeds Producers Association.

GEM.Title: GEM software | APGMB
GEM.Text: Web software coded to manage the mustard agriculture yearly plan for the Burgundy Mustard industry.

ESIREM.Title: ESIREM Past papers platform
ESIREM.Text: I developed a web platform to facilitate the access to the past papers at ESIREM and to share those available. This makes it easier to work exams and communicate useful documents to students.

LearnApp.Title: LearnApp platform
LearnApp.Text: This web platform (in development) is based on my Python GeoBrevet software. It will be extended to various other applets, GeoBrevet will be one of them.

Books.Title: My books
Books.Text: My author website shows you all my books and writings.

Texts.Explanation: This service is 24h/24 available, except during interruptions due to the User connexion or the Provider connexion. This service is always rebooted every Sunday at 11:59 PM. The service will be unavailable during the short period due to the server reboot.
Texts.Uptime: This service is UP since

Monitoring.Title: Services monitoring
Monitoring.Text: On https://status.nicolas-t.ovh, you can have access to the monitoring service of my server.

Asking.Title: Ask a question
Asking.Text: Concerning every question or request about this service, please feel free to contact my webmaster at this e-mail address. You will get an answer as quick as possible.
